data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sarvašová, Adela, Kočišová, Alica, Halán, Miloš, Delécolle, Jean-Claude, Mathieu, Bruno (2014): Morphological and molecular analysis of the genus Culicoides (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae) in Slovakia with five new records. Zootaxa 3872 (5): 541-560, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3872.5.6
